children.text: The render repairs have been poorly finished with visible sections that do not match the colour and texture of the surrounding areas, which detracts from the overall finish.
The Victorian Building Authority’s, Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 9.05 Repairs to applied finishes states that
‘Repairs to surfaces that have been rendered are defective if they do not match the colour and texture of the remaining wall or adjacent area as close as practicable’.
The walls will need to be re-rendered so there are no obvious blemishes in the wall.
